title: About Us
body:
## **Who Are You?**

There's a 96% chance you're a dude. Probably 21-50 years old and living in the US.

Although, if you're in India, Germany or Australia etc, you'll still enjoy our content.

You love sport and bet on it. You'd rather win than lose, and unlike plenty of pickles out there, you like to do a little homework. 

You come to Bet Refinery each day to bounce your bets off our sophisticated betting models. We're your sense check.

Or you just want to know exactly what to bet on with spoon fed expert tips. We got you too.

We want to give you a community of sport bettors that you can shoot the sh*t with and share your wins with.

Now, onto us. Who are we are and why should you give Bet Refinery any of your scarce attention?

- - -

## **Who Are We?**

Based in Australia but we've got an office in Brooklyn when our Prime Minister lets us travel again.

### **Jason Wong**

One of our founders, Jason Wong, is one of the world's sharpest sports betting data scientists.

You can **[read how Jas left his quant position at a bank](https://www.betfair.com.au/hub/the-banker-a-quants-afl-betting-strategy/)**, and successfully modelled a sport he'd never watched!

He hasn't looked back, turning full time professional in 2016. Meaning his exclusive (and healthy) income has been sports betting.

## **Jonno Lowe**

Equally as sharp, with a lot more time on the court, has been Jonno Lowe. 

The aussie statitician started modeling sport while at University. 

He started with tennis and had people climbing the walls for his outputs, so he opened the paid service **[Sportpunter ](https://www.dailyprofit.com.au/)**in 2003! 

Talk about an OG. The man has been living off hig winning models largely ever since and we're so thrilled to share some of those on Bet Refinery.

You can still sign up for his NBA Totals package **[HERE ](https://www.dailyprofit.com.au/)**though. It's unique to the NBA Predictions Model we have on site. Though ours is also lethal.

### **James McLoughlin**

One of our other co-founders, JMac, has been betting since 2008.

JMac has worked at all of the biggest sportsbooks in Australia. Including Sportsbet (Fanduel), Betfair, Sportingbet (William Hill) and Betstar (BetMGM).

He's had his finger on the pulse for over a decade and makes a part time living by finding incorrect pricing on sportsbook websites. He used to bet professionally with automated horse racing models but two kids have slowed the ol' boy down.
